AccumulatedVolume.description: Measured or calculated accumulated volume of a fluid since last reset.

Volume.description: Measured or calculated actual volume of a fluid.

ApparentPower.description: Measured or calculated actual apparent power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

Current.description: Measured or calculated actual root mean square of the electric power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

Energy.description: Measured or calculated accumulated electrical energy consumed including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …) since last reset.

Power.description: Measured or calculated actual electric real power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

StartTime.description: Indicates the point in time at which the collection of the statistical data has been started.

Voltage.description: Measured or calculated actual root mean square of the voltage applied including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

data.description: Measured or calculated actual apparent power consumption including all auxiliary components (e.g. on a compressor including fans, controller, …).

Warning.description: Check required, possibly there is a problem that leads to an Error.

Error.description: Immediate action needed to avoid Critical.

Critical.description: At least one requirement cannot be fulfilled.

FullyIntegrated.description: The MCS controls all compressors of this airnet.

PartiallyIntegrated.description: At least one compressor of this airnet is not controlled by the MCS.

FullyIsolated.description: The MCS does not control any compressor of this airnet.

Other.description: The airnet is in a state not specified by this enumeration.

Stopped.description: The requirements shall not be fulfilled.

Starting.description: Transition phase to end in Operational state.

Stopping.description: Transition phase to end in Stopped state.

AirDeliveryRate.description: Volume of generated compressed air per time frame.

CompressorsIntegrated.description: Number of integrated compressors in the airnet.

CompressorsIsolated.description: Number of isolated compressors in the airnet.

CompressorsNotAvailable.description: Number of unavailable compressors in the airnet.

VolumeFlowRateUnavailable.description: Calculated unavailable volume flow rate of the process fluid in the airnet.

ResetStatistics.description: Restarts all statistical data, including a reset of the StartTime to the current time.

RealTime.description: Real time passed since last counter reset.

RealTimeToNextService.description: Real time left until the real time of the next service level is exceeded.

ResetCondition.description: The reason and context for the reset of the statistics, which is done without a trigger from an OPC UA Client, like calling the ResetStatistics Method. ResetCondition is a vendor-specific, human readable string. ResetCondition is non-localized and might contain an expression that can be parsed by certain clients. Examples are: “AFTER 4 HOURS”, “AFTER 1000 ITEMS”, “OPERATOR”. “OPERATOR” means, that an operator resets the statistics on a local HMI.

RunningTime.description: Time spent running since last counter reset.

RunningTimeToNextService.description: Running time left until the running time of the next service level is exceeded.

StartTime.description: Indicates the point in time at which the collection of the statistical data has been started.

data.description: Real time passed since last counter reset.
Real time left until the real time of the next service level is exceeded.
Time spent running since last counter reset.
Running time left until the running time of the next service level is exceeded.

FilterClassEnum.description: possible filter classes according to ISO 8573-1

S0.description: As specified by the equipment user or supplier and more stringent than class 1.

S1.description: Particles: By Particle Size: 0.1 µm < d ≤ 0.5 µm: ≤ 20,000; 0.5 µ m< d ≤ 1.0 µm: ≤ 400; 1.0 µm < d ≤ 5.0 µm: ≤ 10;  Water: Vapor Pressure Dewpoint: ≤ -70 °C, ≤ -94 °F;  Oil: Liquid, Aerosol, & Vapor: ≤ 0.01 mg/m3;

S2.description: Particles: By Particle Size: 0.1 µm < d ≤ 0.5 µm: ≤ 400,000; 0.5 µ m< d ≤ 1.0 µm: ≤ 6,000; 1.0 µm < d ≤ 5.0 µm: ≤ 100;  Water: Vapor Pressure Dewpoint: ≤ -40 °C, ≤ -40 °F;  Oil: Liquid, Aerosol, & Vapor: ≤ 0.1 mg/m3;

S3.description: Particles: By Particle Size: 0.5 µ m< d ≤ 1.0 µm: ≤ 90,000; 1.0 µm < d ≤ 5.0 µm: ≤ 1,000;  Water: Vapor Pressure Dewpoint: ≤ -20 °C, ≤ -4 °F;  Oil: Liquid, Aerosol, & Vapor: ≤ 1 mg/m3;

S4.description: Particles: By Particle Size: 1.0 µm < d ≤ 5.0 µm: ≤ 10,000;  Water: Vapor Pressure Dewpoint: ≤ +3 °C, ≤ +37 °F;  Oil: Liquid, Aerosol, & Vapor: ≤ 5 mg/m3;

S5.description: Particles: By Particle Size: 1.0 µm < d ≤ 5.0 µm: ≤ 100,000;  Water: Vapor Pressure Dewpoint: ≤ +7 °C, ≤ +45 °F;

S6.description: Particles: By Mass: 0 – ≤ 5 mg/m3;  Water: Vapor Pressure Dewpoint: ≤ +10 °C, ≤ +50 °F;

S7.description: Particles: By Mass: 5 – ≤ 10 mg/m3;  Water: Liquid: ≤ 0.5 g/m3;

X.description: Particles: By Mass: > 10 mg/m3;  Water: Liquid: > 10 g/m3;  Oil: Liquid, Aerosol, & Vapor: > 5 mg/m3;

Other.description: The compressor is in a state not specified by this enumeration.

Starting.description: Transition phase to end in Unloaded state.

Stopping.description: Transition phase to end in Stopped state.

Unloaded.description: The motor is running but the compressor does not deliver compressed air to the airnet.

Loading.description: Transition phase to end in Loaded state.

Unloading.description: Transition phase to end in Unloaded state.

Loaded.description: The compressor does deliver compressed air to the airnet.

ActivePressureBand.description: Indicates the actual active pressure band.

FlowRateRatio.description: Calculated ratio of actual and maximum possible flow rate of a compressor.

SpecificEnergyRequirement.description: Calculated shaft input energy per unit of compressor actual rate of flow.

CatalyticMaterialTemperature.description: Measured actual temperature of the catalytic material inside a converter.

data.description: Measured actual temperature of the catalytic material inside a converter.

DrainTest.description: Invoke a drain test on a condensate drain.

Other.description: The dryer is in a state not specified by this enumeration.

Stopped.description: The dryer is stopped. This state is applicable to all adsorption dryers.

Running.description: The dryer is running. This state is applicable to all dryers.

RefrigerantCompressorStopped.description: The compressor of the refrigerant circuit is standing still, and the refrigerant dryer is operating using the stored cold. This state is applicable to refrigerant dryers.

RefrigerantCompressorRunning.description: The compressor of the refrigerant circuit is running and compressing refrigerant, creating cold. This state is applicable to refrigerant dryers.

PurgeValveClosed.description: Purge valve is closed, and no purge air is consumed, no purge of the humidity from membranes dryer. This state is applicable to membrane dryers.

PurgeValveOpen.description: Purge air can flow to purge the humidity out of the membrane dryer. This state is applicable to membrane dryers.

ParallelModeOfBothVessels.description: Both vessels of the adsorption dryer are used in parallel for adsorption. This state is applicable to all adsorption dryers.

Depressurizing.description: One vessel of the adsorption dryer is depressurized for regeneration. This state is applicable to heatless and heated adsorption dryers, not HOC.

Desorbing.description: One vessel of the adsorption dryer is in desorption phase, using purge or ambient air, heated or not heated. This state is applicable to all adsorption dryers.

Cooling.description: One vessel of the adsorption dryer is being cooled after being heated in the previous desorption phase. This state is applicable to heated adsorption dryers and HOC.

Pressurizing.description: The depressurized vessel is pressurized again. This state is applicable to heatless and heated adsorption dryers, not HOC.

RegeneratedVesselInStand_by.description: The regenerated vessel is in standby and ready for adsorption phase. This state is applicable to all adsorption dryers.

OnOff.description: Actual OnOff state of the dryer. For membrane dryers this describes the state of the controller.

OperatingState.title: DryerOperatingStateEnum
OperatingState.description: Actual operating state of the dryer.

PressureDewPoint.description: Measured or calculated actual pressure dew point of the process fluid at a dryer.

data.description: Actual OnOff state of the dryer. For membrane dryers this describes the state of the controller.

data.title: DryerOperatingStateEnum
data.description: Actual operating state of the dryer.
Measured or calculated actual pressure dew point of the process fluid at a dryer.

UnloadedTime.description: Time spent in unloaded state since last counter reset.

EventId.description: The identifier for the event to comment.

Comment.description: The comment to add to the condition.

MonitoredItemId.description: The identifier for the monitored item to refresh.

Comment.description: The comment to add to the condition.

DefaultInstanceBrowseName.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type.
The default BrowseName for instances of the type.

DeviceRevision.description: A string representation of the overall revision level of the component. Often, it is increased when either the SoftwareRevision and / or the HardwareRevision of the component is increased. As an example, it can be used in ERP systems together with the ProductCode.

AssetId.description: To be used by end users to store a unique identification in the context of their overall application. Servers shall support at least 40 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 40 Unicode characters into that field.

ComponentName.description: To be used by end users to store a human-readable localized text for the MachineryItem. The minimum number of locales supported for this property shall be two. Servers shall support at least 40 Unicode characters for the clients writing the text part of each locale, this means clients can expect to be able to write texts with a length of 40 Unicode characters into that field.

DefaultInstanceBrowseName.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type.

DeviceClass.description: Indicates in which domain or for what purpose the MachineryItem is used.

HardwareRevision.description: A string representation of the revision level of the hardware of a MachineryItem. Hardware is physical equipment, as opposed to programs, procedures, rules and associated documentation. Many machines will not provide such information due to the modular and configurable nature of the machine.

InitialOperationDate.description: The date, when the MachineryItem was switched on the first time after it has left the manufacturer plant.

Manufacturer.description: A human-readable, localized name of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.

ManufacturerUri.description: A globally unique identifier of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.

Model.description: A human-readable, localized name of the model of the MachineryItem.

MonthOfConstruction.description: The month in which the manufacturing process of the MachineryItem has been completed. It shall be a number between 1 and 12, representing the month from January to December.

ProductCode.description: A machine-readable string of the model of the MachineryItem, that might include options like the hardware configuration of the model. This information might be provided by the ERP system of the vendor. For example, it can be used as order information.

ProductInstanceUri.description: A globally unique resource identifier provided by the manufacturer of the MachineryItem.

SerialNumber.description: A string containing a unique production number of the manufacturer of the MachineryItem. The global uniqueness of the serial number is only given in the context of the manufacturer, and potentially the model. The value shall not change during the life-cycle of the MachineryItem.

SoftwareRevision.description: A string representation of the revision level of a MachineryItem. In most cases, MachineryItems consist of several software components. In that case, information about the software components might be provided as additional information in the address space, including individual revision information. In that case, this property is either not provided or provides an overall software revision level. The value might change during the life-cycle of a MachineryItem.

YearOfConstruction.description: The year (Gregorian calendar) in which the manufacturing process of the MachineryItem has been completed. It shall be a four-digit number and never change during the life-cycle of a MachineryItem.

DefaultInstanceBrowseName.description: The default BrowseName for instances of the type.

Location.description: To be used by end users to store the location of the machine in a scheme specific to the end user. Servers shall support at least 60 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 60 Unicode characters into that field.

ProductInstanceUri.description: A globally unique resource identifier provided by the manufacturer of the machine

UIElement.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.

data.description: Stand-in for an unspecified data type.
